title: The Phantom Email
setting: Crescent Media Group, open floor, Thursday 10 AM
premise: An anonymous email was sent from the shared marketing account at 3:17 AM criticizing the CEO's new policy. The email went to every employee in the company.

suspects.name: Nadia Volkov
suspects.motive: Publicly clashed with the CEO over the new policy last week
suspects.alibi: I was asleep at home. My smart doorbell shows no activity at my front door between midnight and 6 AM. I had no reason to be up at 3 AM.

suspects.name: Jared Kim
suspects.motive: The new policy cuts overnight security staff from three to one
suspects.alibi: I was doing my patrol rounds all night. I walked every floor between 2 AM and 4 AM. I don't even know the marketing account password.

suspects.name: Simone Adler
suspects.motive: Has been fielding angry complaints about the policy for days
suspects.alibi: I was home watching a late movie until 1 AM, then went straight to bed. My husband can confirm I was home all night.

suspects.name: Kent Bridges
suspects.motive: Passed over for a promotion he blames on the new restructuring policy
suspects.alibi: I was at a friend's apartment across town for a game night. We played until about 2 AM, then I crashed on his couch until morning.

clues.title: Email Server Metadata
clues.content: The IT team traced the email's origin IP address to the office VPN. It was sent from a device connected remotely, not from inside the building.

clues.title: Security Patrol Log
clues.content: Jared's patrol log shows he scanned his checkpoint badge on every floor between 2:15 AM and 3:45 AM. All scans are verified by the security system timestamps.

clues.title: VPN Connection Records
clues.content: The office VPN log shows a connection from Kent's registered laptop at 3:12 AM Thursday, lasting nine minutes. Kent claims he was asleep at his friend's apartment by 2 AM.
